full_text: Bl Lee Be 2020/KER/191 IN THE HIGH COURT OF KERALA AT ERNAKULAM PRESENT THE HONOURABLE MR. PETER RESIDING AT PULIVEZH HOUSE, KONAM ROAD, PALLURUTHY P.O, PERUMPADAPPY SOUTH KONAM, ERNAKULAM-06 3 ALDRIN ANTONY, Be CRL.MC.NO. 8791 OF 2019 2 2020/KER/191 AGED 21 YEARS, S/O.ANTONY, RESIDING AT PALLI PARAMBIL, CULTUS ROAD, PALLURUTHY.P.O, PERUMBADAPPU, ERNAKULAM-06 4 TENNISON, AGED 23 YEARS, S/O.JOSEPH, RESIDING AT PUTHENPURAKKAL HOUSE, PERUMPADAPPU, ERNAKULAM DISTRICT, PIN-682,006 Rl C.S.HRITHWIK-SR.P.P R2-4 BY ADV. SHRI.RAIEEZ M ASHRAF THIS CRIMINAL MISC. CASE HAVING COME UP FOR ADMISSION ON 06.01.2020, THE COURT ON THE SAME DAY PASSED THE FOLLOWING: _ CRL.MC.NO. 8791 OF 2019 3 2020/KER/191 ORDER Dated this the 06 day of January, 2020 The petitioners are accused in C.C.No. 173/2019 on the files of the Judicial First Class Magistrate Court Il, Kochi for having allegedly committed offences punishable under Sections 341, 323, 324 and 294(b) read with Section 34 of the IPC. The defacto complainant and injured are respondents 2 to 4 who have appeared through counsel and filed affidavits to the effect that the matter has been amicably settled with the petitioners and that they have no grievance against them. A report has been submitted by the Investigating Officer through the learned Senior Public Prosecutor to the said effect. The petitioners do not have any criminal antecedents. In the result, the Crl.MC is allowed and the entire proceedings as against the petitioners in C.C.No.173/2019 on the files of the Judicial First Class Magistrate Court Il, Kochi stands quashed under Section 482 of the Cr.P.C and the accused are discharged. Sd/- ASHOK MENON JUDGE asm Pease eet By CRL.MC.NO. 8791 OF 2019 4 2020/KER/191 APPENDIX EXHIBITS: ANNEXURE Al THE CERTIFIED COPY OF THE FINAL REPORT/CHARGE SHEET, IN CRIME NO.40/2019 OF PALLURUTHY KAASABA POLICE STATION ERNARULAM DISTRICT. ANNEXURE A2 THE AFFIDAVIT, SOLEMNLY AFFIRMED BY THE 2ND RESPONDENT/DEFACTO COMPLAINANT. ANNEXURE A3 THE AFFIDAVIT, SOLEMNLY AFFIRMED BY THE 3RD RESPONDENT/DEFACTO COMPLAINANT. ANNEXURE A4 THE AFFIDAVIT, SOLEMNLY AFFIRMED BY THE 4TH RESPONDENT/DEFACTO COMPLAINANT. //True Copy// PA to Judge
